Event.name: Indicating
Event.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Communicator</fen> or <fen>Medium</fen> assigns linguistic meaning to an <fen>Unresolved_referent</fen> thereby identifying the specific actor or entity which fulfills the answer to this question.
<ex>Can <fex name="Communicator">you</fex> <t>name</t> <fex name="Unresolved_referent">all the U.S. Presidents</fex>?</ex>
<ex><fex name="Communicator">No doctor</fex> can <t>name</t> <fex name="Unresolved_referent">the disease that's killing him</fex>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Frequency">Every year</fex>, <fex name="Medium">InfoWorld</fex> <t>names</t> <fex name="Unresolved_referent">100 companies that have made the best use of technology</fex>.</ex>
</def-root>

Arg.name: Communicator
Arg.definition: <def-root>The person who uses language in the written or spoken modality to convey the <fen>Unresolved_referent</fen> to another person. </def-root>

Arg.name: Unresolved_referent
Arg.definition: <def-root>The thing to which the <fen>Communicator</fen> or <fen>Medium</fen> refers for identification purposes. </def-root>

Arg.name: Medium
Arg.definition: <def-root>The physical or abstract setting in which the <fen>Unresolved_referent</fen> is conveyed. </def-root>

Arg.name: Amount_of_information
Arg.definition: <def-root>The amount of information exchanged when communication occurs. </def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Manner</fen> in which the <fen>Communicator</fen> makes the indication.</def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Means</fen> by which the <fen>Communicator</fen> makes the indication.</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition:
<def-root>When the the <fen>Communicator</fen> is makes the indication.
<ex><fex name="Time">When this is resolved</fex>, I will <t>name</t> the winner.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Duration
Arg.definition: <def-root><fen>Duration</fen> is the length of time during which the indicating takes place.</def-root>

Arg.name: Frequency
Arg.definition:
<def-root>How often the <fen>Communicator</fen> or <fen>Medium</fen> indicates the <fen>Unresolved_referent</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Frequency">Every month</fex>, new people <t>name</t> him in connection with these crimes.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Explanation
Arg.definition: <def-root>The reason why the <fen>Communicator</fen> is indicating the <fen>Unresolved_referent</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>The location where the <fen>Communicator</fen> or <fen>Medium</fen> indicates the <fen>Unresolved_referent</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>To what end the <fen>Communicator</fen> or <fen>Medium</fen> makes the indication.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: name.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to give an indentity to

lexUnit.name: indicate.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to point out or make known

lexUnit.name: identify.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to establish as being a particular person or thing

lexUnit.name: finger.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to identify someone or inform on to the police
